title: Nighthawks Hideaway
description: Join Alistair Covax for a sophisticated little soiree with jazz, stimulating conversation, beautiful ladies, and more jazz. A single episode you can watch over and over. It feels different every time.
quote: Sometimes when the jazz is playing, I like to do this. I move my chin just a little.
altHero: Alistair Covax in a tux holding a cigarette stands by Charlie at the piano
alt1: elevator buttons with the top one illuminated with an icon of a hawk
alt2: Covax talks with a woman at a cocktail party
alt3: Covax talks with another man on the couch as they are served by a cocktail waitress
alt4: Covax and guests wave at the camera
